casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Angela Marie RANKIN 23A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 5, 2018 Sarah Holladay, Attorney at Law, for Rankin, Angela Marie. Amy Bircher, Assistant Attorney General, Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of March 2018 by Plaintiff-Appellant :

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of March 2018."

*607Plaintiff-Appellant shall have up to and including the 9th day of April 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
